src:
Polri Akan Sidang Etik 4 Oknum Polisi yang Bantu Culik dan Peras WN Inggris
04 Nov 2019, 01:00 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Divisi Propam Polri akan menindak empat anggotanya yang diduga ikut membantu menculik dan memeras WN Inggris bernama Matthew Simon Craib. Propam Polri akan melakukan sidang etik terhadap keempatnya.
"Ditangani Resmob Polda Metro (untuk pidana). Untuk pelanggaran disiplin dan kode etik ditangani Propam Metro, gabungan dengan Propam Mabes," kata Kadiv Propam Polri, Irjen Listyo Sigit kepada detikcom, Minggu (4/11/2019).
Sigit mengatakan, nantinya penindakan akan dilakukan Propram Polri bersama Propam Polda Metro Jaya. Sidang etik akan dilakukan setelah berkas pidana para pelaku selesai.
"Setelah proses penanganan pidana berkasnya selesai," kata dia.
text:
National Police Will Ethics Session 4 Police Officers who Help Kidnap and Squeeze British Citizens
Nov 04 2019, 01:00 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - The Indonesian Police Propam Division will take action against four of its members who are allegedly involved in kidnapping and extorting a British citizen named Matthew Simon Craib. Propam Polri will conduct an ethics hearing on the four.
"Handled by Metro Police Resmob (for criminal). For violations of discipline and code of ethics handled by Propam Metro, combined with Headquarters Propam," Kadam Propam Polri, Inspector General Listyo Sigit told AFP on Sunday (11/04/2019).
Sigit said that later the action would be carried out by Propram Polri and Propam Polda Metro Jaya. The ethics hearing will be conducted after the criminal files of the perpetrators are finished.
"After the criminal handling process, the file is complete," he said.
